name: HTMLMediaElement.seekable
description: The seekable read-only property of the HTMLMediaElement returns a TimeRanges object that contains the time ranges that the user is able to seek to, if any.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLMediaElement' in HTML Living Standard.

refs.name: Media Source Extensions
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLMediaElement extensions, like for seekable' in Media Source Extensions.
